titleStmt.title: The Valiant commander, with his resolute lady. Shewing, a brief discourse of a commander bold ... To a new northern tune, called, I would give ten thousand pounds she were in Shrewsbury. Or, Ned Smith.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing V36.
Reproduction of original in: British Library (reel 2123.2:220-221) and University of Glasgow Library (2694:2).
